Class OpeningHoursDAO

java.lang.Object
DataBase.dao.OpeningHoursDAO
public class OpeningHoursDAO extends Object
Data Access Object for managing restaurant opening hours.

Handles weekly opening hours, special dates, and provides logic utilities for reservation availability and time slots.

  • Method Details

    • insertOpeningHours

      public static void insertOpeningHours(String dayOfWeek, Time openTime, Time closeTime, String isSpecial, Date specialDate) throws Exception
      Inserts a raw opening-hours record into the database.

      Used mainly by data importers or initial system setup.

      Parameters:
      dayOfWeek - day name (e.g. "Sunday")
      openTime - opening time
      closeTime - closing time
      isSpecial - "YES" if special date, otherwise "NO"
      specialDate - specific date for special hours, or null
      Throws:
      Exception - if a database error occurs

    • insertSpecialHour

      public static void insertSpecialHour(String dateStr, String dayOfWeekIgnored, String open, String close) throws Exception
      Inserts a special opening-hours entry for a specific calendar date.

      Overrides regular weekly hours for the given date.

      Parameters:
      dateStr - ISO date string (YYYY-MM-DD)
      dayOfWeekIgnored - ignored parameter (kept for compatibility)
      open - opening time (HH:mm)
      close - closing time (HH:mm)
      Throws:
      Exception - if a database error occurs

    • getAllOpeningHours

      public static List<OpeningHoursDTO> getAllOpeningHours() throws Exception
      Retrieves all opening-hours entries.

      Includes both regular weekly hours and special dates, ordered for management display.

      Returns:
      list of opening-hours DTOs
      Throws:
      Exception - if a database error occurs

    • updateOpeningHour

      public static boolean updateOpeningHour(int id, String open, String close) throws Exception
      Updates opening and closing times of an existing entry.
      Parameters:
      id - opening-hours record ID
      open - new opening time
      close - new closing time
      Returns:
      true if update succeeded
      Throws:
      Exception - if a database error occurs

    • deleteOpeningHour

      public static boolean deleteOpeningHour(int id) throws Exception
      Deletes an opening-hours entry by ID.
      Parameters:
      id - record identifier
      Returns:
      true if deletion succeeded
      Throws:
      Exception - if a database error occurs

    • getHoursForDate

      public static String getHoursForDate(LocalDate date) throws Exception
      Returns String for UI Label (e.g. "08:00 - 22:00")
      Throws:
      Exception

    • isOpenForReservation

      public static boolean isOpenForReservation(Timestamp startTs, int diningMinutes) throws Exception
      Checks whether a reservation can be scheduled at the given time.

      Ensures the reservation fits entirely within opening hours.

      Parameters:
      startTs - requested start time
      diningMinutes - duration of the visit
      Returns:
      true if reservation is allowed
      Throws:
      Exception - if a database error occurs

    • getAvailableTimeSlots

      public static List<String> getAvailableTimeSlots(LocalDate date, int slotMinutes, int diningMinutes) throws Exception
      Calculates available reservation time slots for a given date.

      Considers opening hours, slot length, dining duration, and same-day time restrictions.

      Parameters:
      date - reservation date
      slotMinutes - interval between slots
      diningMinutes - duration of visit
      Returns:
      list of available time slots (HH:mm)
      Throws:
      Exception - if a database error occurs
